meanings.definition: Not capable of being diffused or spread out.
meanings.sent1: The paint formed a nondiffusible layer on the canvas, staying in one spot.
meanings.sent2: The nondiffusible perfume stayed strong in the room for hours.
meanings.sent3: The nondiffusible rumor about the alien invasion caused a lot of excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her nondiffusible determination to succeed was like a solid wall against any obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The nondiffusible fog hung heavily over the city, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Not able to be dispersed or distributed.
meanings.sent1: The nondiffusible ink on the paper dried quickly and did not smudge.
meanings.sent2: The medication had a nondiffusible effect, targeting only the affected area.
meanings.sent3: The nondiffusible glitter on the birthday card sparkled brightly under the light.
meanings.sent4: His nondiffusible focus on the task at hand impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The nondiffusible energy in the room made everyone feel motivated and alert.

meanings.definition: Unable to be diffused or scattered.
meanings.sent1: The nondiffusible sound of the bell echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent2: The nondiffusible heat from the fireplace kept the room warm and cozy.
meanings.sent3: The nondiffusible bubbles in the soda tickled her nose as she took a sip.
meanings.sent4: His nondiffusible anger towards the situation was evident in his clenched fists.
meanings.sent5: The nondiffusible scent of fresh flowers filled the room with a sweet fragrance.
